page.title: 05Education in Radcliffe,cont.
page.content: Sporting activities are important in our school,such as football, netball, rounders, cricket and cross-country. The netball team has been very successful in recent years.School productions such as 'The Wizard of Oz'and'Oliver'have been staged and have been extremely popular. The latest technology is used in our school. We have 2 BBC micro-computers and a video recorder.School clubs are also important.There is a gym club, badminton, choir, recorders and sports practices of all kinds.School life can be very interesting and enjoyable if you are prepared to make the most of it.
